title: Ghost Thread Experience
description: An experimental web application that explores the concept of 'ghost threads' - digital remnants of handwritten notes and thoughts that persist in digital spaces.

fullDescription.content: Ghost Thread Experience is an experimental web application that explores the concept of 'ghost threads' - digital remnants of handwritten notes and thoughts that persist in digital spaces. The project simulates a terminal/console interface for viewing and interacting with these digitized thoughts.

With its retro-futuristic aesthetic featuring a dark theme with magenta/pink accents, the application creates an immersive environment that blurs the line between analog and digital, past and present.

items.title: ECHO READER
items.content: A terminal-like interface that displays chronological entries from ghost-trace sessions

items.title: Scratch Viewer
items.content: A split-view interface showing both the original handwritten notes and their AI-parsed text equivalents

items.title: Session Tracking
items.content: Organizes thoughts and notes into discrete sessions with timestamps and confidence scores
